article_title: Here are some ways to protect your privacy while video conferencing
article_description: As many are stuck at home as a result of the outbreak of COVID 19  more people are turning to Zoom to stay connected with work colleagues and loved ones
article_content: As many are stuck at home as a result of the outbreak of COVID 19  more people are turning to the video conferencing platform Zoom to stay connected with work colleagues and loved ones But with the rise of the service s popularity comes a new challenge  Zoo   1871 chars
